alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 12:49AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ottawa, northwestern Sandusky, Wood and Lucas Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1249 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Toledo to near Napoleon. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toledo, Bowling Green, Swanton, Perrysburg, Oregon, Rossford, Waterville, Northwood, Whitehouse, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Genoa, Woodville, Holland, Weston, Elmore, Maumee, Ottawa Hills, Walbridge and Pemberville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for northwestern Ohio.
